msbt.message: Sure am glad you were able to step in and deliver Santa's presents yesterday, . Santa sent a toy, and I'm havin' a grand time with it! Hard to think I might not have gotten it all
I appreciate you runnin' all over, delivering Santa's presents for him, . Gettin' presents is one of life's little pleasures, and it's real neighborly of you to make that happen for me.

Thanks for the present yesterday! I've got a good spot picked out where I can see it all the time. One of the side effects of gettin' older is you get REAL sentimental about the important stuff, kiddo.

It was fun tradin' presents with you yesterday! I hope you liked mine as much as I liked yours. I changed my mind about what to getcha like six times. Good thing I always save my receipts! <10_4 />Always.
You're a hero, kiddoâ€”a goldarned HERO. Shoppin' for a present for me AND deliverin' for Santa? H.E.R.O. You gave me the best Toy Day of my life, and, between you and me, that's a LOT of Toy Days, !
Thanks again for the present yesterday! Presents, really, since you delivered Santa's as well! He sent a toy, believe it or not, and I can't seem to stop playin' with it, even at my age, .
Huh. Day after Toy Day feels pretty much like any other day. Guess I'll just get on with it, .
So do you eat all your Toy Day treats on the day, or do you like to spread 'em out for a while, ? Me, I just eat a lotta treats. Who's to say which ones were the Toy Day ones?
